document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Within </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thy </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#6cffa8">Grave! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Oh </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">no, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">but </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">on </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">some </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">other </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#eca078">flight </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Thou </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">only </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">camest </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">mankind </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">rend </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">Good </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">night </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Within thy grave!
